props.description: The AI Fundamentals Course offers introductory training in artificial intelligence, including core concepts, practical applications, and strategies for enabling a data-informed organization. Participants will explore use cases, organizational impact, and how existing technologies can support their goals. This course is ideal for individuals new to AI who want to better understand its value and integration into daily operations.

The Applied AI Workshop delivers foundational AI education tailored for professionals across roles and levels. The course addresses common misconceptions, explains real-world applications, and provides both strategic and hands-on learning tracks. Sessions can be customized to meet the needs of leadership teams or technical workforces, offering flexible delivery and actionable insights into practical AI implementation.

content: Adaptable to technical and non-technical teams
